mainStep.name: Initial Build Validation
mainStep.errorMessage: The build validation failed. The system hasn't been modified, and is still stable, but you should fix the problems described in the validation messages below (either by uninstalling the affected modules, or by fixing the problems the validation found), and then start the build again.

mainStep.name: Build
